name: FPS Platformer
description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to my new game, FPS Platformer.

This game has only 3 levels and being made in a week!
(Glitches can be found, if so then please comment below)

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Attack - Left Click

Sprint - Left Shift

I hope you enjoy the game! Let me know what you think in the comments :)

Thanks!

Regards - The Coder GD
